# Simple Markdown Document

This is a basic markdown document with common elements.

## Section 1

A paragraph with **bold** and *italic* text.

## Section 2

A list of items:

- Item 1
- Item 2
- Item 3

### Subsection

A code block:

```rust
fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world!");
}
```

## Section 3

A link to [Rust](https://www.rust-lang.org/) and an inline `code` example.
